changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Connaître l'adresse ip de votre interpho: Find out the ip address of your 2N intercom
index.md.Avoir créé un compte utilisateur via l'i: Have created a user account via the interface of your 2N intercom
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il faut: After downloading the plugin, you must first activate it, like any Jeedom plugin
index.md.vérifiez que le démon est en OK: check that the daemon is in OK
index.md.Pour un nouvel appareil 2N, il faut se c: For a new 2N device, you must connect to the 2N interface, accessible via the latter's ip address (to find out the IP of your device, you can install the 2N Network Scanner software, which will detect 2N devices. present on your network
index.md.Par défaut, le nom d'utilisateur et le m: By default, the username and password of your 2N device are
index.md.Une fois connecté sur l'interface, il vo: Once connected to the interface, you will need
index.md.Activer les options pour accéder aux ser: Activate the options to access the API services
index.md.Créer un compte avec les droits pour les: Create an account with rights for API services
index.md.Configurer les Switches de votre apparei: Configure the switches on your device
index.md.Créer un utilisateur pour lui attribuer: Create a user to assign your access codes to the intercom
index.md.Une fois cela fait, vous pouvez créer vo: Once this is done, you can create your equipment in Jeedom with the password and the username of the 2n account configured with API rights (see above
index.md.Dans les menus déroulants, choisir les m: In the drop-down menus, choose the modules installed or not on your intercom
index.md.Vous pouvez créer directement sans passe: You can create directly without going through the interface of your 2N, a code per Switch available depending on your device, in Superuser Code
index.md.Vous pouvez séparer les codes par une vi: You can separate the codes with a comma to assign multiple codes per Switch
index.md.Vous pouvez également changer le type de: You can also change the type of signal when an invalid card is passed in front of the reader (Simple Beep, Beep + Light, or None
index.md.Lui attribuer un parent et le rendre vis: Assign it a parent and make it visible and active
index.md.Si vous avez une camera sur votre équipe: If you have a camera on your equipment, a camera object will be created via the Camera plugin; you will have to configure it to make it appear on your dashboard
index.md.Il faut redémarrer le démon après une cr: You must restart the daemon after creating an equipment, to assign it an Identifier for API requests
index.md.Par défaut, les états des switchs sont l: By default, the switch states are linked to their action commands; clicking on the switch activates the switch (we will see the switch icon change color
index.md.L'état des switchs remonte ceux disponib: The state of the switches goes back to those available on your device (from 1 to 4
index.md.Appel vous donne le statut de la communi: Call gives you the communication status if you receive a call from another 2n device (coming, received etc
index.md.Arrachement signale si un arrachement a: Tear-off indicates whether a tearing has occurred (for models equipped with the Anti-tearing module
index.md.Bluetooth_tel_mobile signale l'authentif: Bluetooth_tel_mobile signals the authentication of the Bluetooth reader
index.md.Bruit signale une détection accrue du ni: Noise signals increased detection of noise level
index.md.fait apparaitre le numero de la carte RF: displays the number of the configured RFID card
index.md.fait apparaitre le code tapé sur votre i: displays the code entered on your intercom
index.md.fait apparaitre le dernier appuyé sur vo: shows the last one pressed on your intercom
index.md.fait apparaitre l'Id de la personne enre: displays the ID of the registered person (for equipment equipped with the fingerprint module
index.md.Etat_porte signale un problème au niveau: Door_state indicates a problem with the door status
index.md.Mouvement, signale la détection de mouve: Motion, reports motion detection via a camera (for models equipped with camera only
index.md.Ouverture_non_autorisée, signale une ouv: Unauthorized_opening, signals an unauthorized door opening (for models equipped with digital input only and a start button
index.md.Ouverture_longue, signale une ouverture: Open_long, indicates a door opening too long or a failure to close the door within the allotted time (for models equipped with digital input only
index.md.vous permet de mettre en marche ou en ar: allows you to turn on or off the Switch whose id corresponds and to have a status feedback from your switch
index.md.Activez les logs en mode Debug pour avoi: Activate the logs in Debug mode to have more information on the events detected by your intercom
